snippet: Redpoint Ventures and BV Capital's eVentures have jointly begun a new venture capital firm called Redpoint eVentures based in São Paulo, Brazil -- the latest illustration of the country's growing Internet start-up ecosystem.
abstract: Redpoint Ventures and BV Capital's eVentures have jointly begun a new venture capital firm called Redpoint eVentures based in São Paulo, Brazil -- the latest illustration of the country's growing Internet start-up ecosystem.

headline.main: Redpoint and BV Capital Form Brazilian V.C. Firm
